turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Ordering Coffee at a Café:

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Perfect! Let's get started. Welcome to our café! What kind of coffee would you like to order today?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I don't know what I want exactly, do you have any recommendations for me?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course! We have a few popular options. If you enjoy something classic, we have a rich espresso or a creamy cappuccino. If you prefer something a bit sweeter, a vanilla latte or a caramel macchiato might be great. Anything catching your eye so far?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Sorry, can you repeat again?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course! So, we have a classic espresso, a creamy cappuccino, or if you like something sweeter, a vanilla latte or a caramel macchiato. Let me know which one sounds good to you!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I want to ask if you have Mocha Latte or something like that.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, we do! A mocha latte is definitely on the menu. It’s got that delicious blend of espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate. Would you like to give that a try?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, I would like to try this one.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Great choice! So, would you like your mocha latte in a small, medium, or large size?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I would like a medium size, please.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Perfect, a medium mocha latte it is! Would you like any sugar or sweetener added to it?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “What kind of sweeteners do you have?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: We have a few options, like classic white sugar, raw sugar, and also some sugar-free alternatives like stevia. Which one would you prefer?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Can I have stevia, please?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, I'll add some stevia for you. Now, would you like your mocha latte hot, or would you prefer it iced?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I think I would like Iced.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Got it, an iced mocha latte in a medium size with stevia. That sounds delicious! Is there anything else you'd like to add, like whipped cream or maybe a flavor shot?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I would like to add whipped cream."

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, I'll add some whipped cream on top as well. So, that's a medium iced mocha latte with stevia and whipped cream. Anything else I can get for you?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “ I want to know if it is possible to make the drink with almond milk or you don't have this kind of milk.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Oh, absolutely, we do have almond milk available! I’ll make sure to use that for your mocha latte. That’ll be no problem at all. Anything else you'd like to add?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, thank you.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You’re very welcome! I'll get that started for you right away. If you need anything else, just let me know.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I think now that's it.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Perfect, then! I’ll have that ready for you in just a moment. Thanks so much, and enjoy!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I want to know how much it is and if I can pay with card or cash, or it's not possible cash.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Sure! The medium iced mocha latte with almond milk and whipped cream comes to about five dollars. And yes, you can absolutely pay with a card; we do accept all major credit and debit cards. Let me know if you have any other questions!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “So you don't accept cash, right?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Oh, actually, we do accept cash as well, so you're welcome to pay either way. Whatever's most convenient for you! Let me know if there's anything else you need.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, I will agree with Cash. Thank you.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You're very welcome! I'll have your drink ready, and you can pay with cash whenever you're ready. If you need anything else, just let me know!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “And I think that's it. Thank you.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course! My pleasure. Enjoy your drink, and have a wonderful day! If you need anything else, just let me know.
